name: Thief II: The Metal Age
description:
The newdark mod is required. You can download the exe from 
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1YBaL69D9xHazanNIqo5L14jynl85czcx
content:
Desktop: true
files:
- setup: N/A:Select setup file from GOG
- patch: N/A:Select Patch EXE
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/GOG.com/Thief 2/Thief2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2008
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directx9
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Thief 2
    executable: $setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing NewDark
    executable: $patch
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine: null
